dict.string: The Mac is not connected to AC Power and therefore the removable media device can't be encrypted, plug in the AC adapter and try again
Writing files to unencrypted removable media devices is not allowed, encrypt the disk in order to allow writing files. securely store the password and in case of loss the data will be unaccesible!

Writing files to unencrypted removable media devices is not allowed, encrypt the disk in order to allow writing files. we need to convert this volume to APFS before encryption. Securely store the password and in case of loss the data will be unaccesible!

Writing files to unencrypted removable media devices is not allowed, encrypt the disk in order to allow writing files. As this volume type does not support conversion or encryption we need to erase the volume. all existing content will be erased!!!.
